Class DbmsWrapper

java.lang.Object
  saadadb.database.DbmsWrapper
Direct Known Subclasses:
MysqlWrapper, PostgresWrapper, SQLiteWrapper
public abstract class DbmsWrapper
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
michel * @version $Id$ 07/2009:getInCircle uses QBOX for small cones and BOX + distance for larger ones

openLargeQueryConnection

public java.sql.Connection openLargeQueryConnection()
                                             throws java.lang.Exception
Return a new connection used for large queries. Connection must be transient to avoid memory to explode as it is used That cannot work with sqlite because we would have to load again SQL procs which is quite difficult

Returns:
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
java.lang.Exception

getStoreTable

public abstract java.lang.String[] getStoreTable(java.lang.String table_name,
                                                 int ncols,
                                                 java.lang.String table_file)
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
Does not return a statement bu executye it because of SQLLite which has no SQL stement doing that. JDBC meta data cannot access column description for temporary tables: column number can be given by ncols

Parameters:
table_name -
ncols - used to indicate the number of columns (automatic if -1)
table_file -
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

getIndexableTextType

public abstract java.lang.String getIndexableTextType()

suspendRelationTriggger

public abstract void suspendRelationTriggger(java.lang.String relationName)
                                      throws AbortException
The trigger can dramatically slow down the insertion rate In case of massive insertion in the relation table (SQLLITE) So we remove it before to do such operation. Its job will be done by @see setClassColumns

Parameters:
relationName -
Throws:
AbortException

getCreateTempoTable

public abstract java.lang.String getCreateTempoTable(java.lang.String table_name,
                                                     java.lang.String fmt)
                                              throws FatalException
Although being standard SQL, this statement must be adapted, because Mysql can not handle queries with multiple references to one tempo table. So temporary tables must be considered persistent table and then must be removed explicitly: http://bugs.mysql.com/bug.php?id=10327

Parameters:
table_name -
Returns:
Throws:
